TopicTitle: [WIP][1.9.x-1.12.x] Scatterer-atmospheric scattering (0.0838 - 14/08/2022) Scattering improvements, in-game atmo generation and multi-sun support

Articles.Content: except I don't use IVA view...

So im working on a stock size rss mod and i was wondering is it possible to add a atmosphiric haze. Titan like? I remember seeing something like this with you [@Poodmund](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/128643-poodmund/) but i cant find the post, i got this so far: 

![hgVaCm4.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/hgVaCm4.jpg)

![PIA02146.gif](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/e/e2/PIA02146.gif)

Try and boost the skyextinctionGroundFade and extinctionScatterIntensity values up a bit basically to give you more of a thick cloud mist appearance. I also bumped up the experimentalAtmoScale up to 2.5 to give it a bit of thickness.

im not getting the blueish tone of the atmosphere that should appear. instead my atmosphere is completely transparent. everything else with scatterer works though. this is a pic with sve installed with scatterer. even when i install scatterer by itself the atmosphere doesnt appear. i tried a fresh install and i still cant get it to work properly

[http://imgur.com/zmV0Lul](http://imgur.com/zmV0Lul)
[@blackrack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/104258-blackrack/) Does the sun flare work with multiple stars? I know i asked this before but i would like to know if it works.

Hey blackrack is there any fix for seeing the Scatterer through rings?

![9jTuaQH.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/9jTuaQH.jpg)
performance hit is quite large even on default settings.

> Getting some very weird visuals with Scatterer. Noticed them in 1.1 at times and they're still there in 1.1.1.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> So far I've noticed it around the Mun and Minmus, not around Kerbin and Duna. Haven't looked around other bodies yet but this suggests it only affects bodies without an atmosphere.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Log doesn't show anything to indicate an error, but Scatterer is rather chatty.
> 

Have you tried pressing "rebuild ocean"?

> So im working on a stock size rss mod and i was wondering is it possible to add a atmosphiric haze. Titan like? I remember seeing something like this with you [@Poodmund](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/128643-poodmund/) but i cant find the post, i got this so far:
> 

What poodmund said, also in the config tool you can make the atmosphere look 2x thicker or 3x thicker by multiplying all the betaR components, e.g. 2x thicker betaR for Kerbin = 0.0116,0.0270,0.0662. I used something similar to give Eve a thicker atmo.
